lexUnit.name: rich.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having a great deal of money or assets.

sentence.text: ` I 'm going to get really , really rich . "
The man wants to get rich .
` I have been told to say that he will be very rich when he is older .
` But your dad was rich by the time you came along , " said Constance , ` and mine was dead .

Did Eve hate the Westwards who were so rich for not taking her into the big house ?

So you think you are rich enough to carry on .
I may add that he is enormously rich , and whatever his whims may be he can very easily satisfy them .
